items.sentence: Tom told Mary he'd never eat any wild mushroom.
Tom told Mary he intended to eat lunch at home.
Tom told Mary he didn't want anything to drink.
Tom told Mary about what John wanted him to do.
Tom says he needs to find someone to help Mary.
Tom saw Mary sitting by herself in the library.
Tom saw Mary eating at a table near the window.
Tom sat on the porch swing and smoked his pipe.
Tom promised Mary he wouldn't eat her sandwich.
Tom isn't happy with the way things turned out.
Tom is the person who taught me how to do this.
Tom isn't the only person who needs to do that.
Tom isn't the only one who didn't say anything.
Tom is the last person who lived in this house.
Tom forgot to put the milk in the refrigerator.
Tom doesn't really care whether he wins or not.
Tom didn't really enjoy eating with us, did he?
Was Tom the one who showed Mary how to do that?
Tom wouldn't do that, so I asked Mary to do it.
Tom waited in the park while Mary was shopping.
Tom says he hopes Mary can get home by herself.
Tom says he expects Mary to get home on Monday.
Tom isn't the only boy invited to Mary's party.
Tom isn't the one who told me where Mary lives.
When I started doing that, Tom told me to stop.
Tom showed the letter he got from Mary to John.
Tom should tell Mary why he enjoyed doing that.
Tom should probably tell Mary he won't do that.
Tom says he thought Mary had already done that.
Tom says he doesn't know what Mary ought to do.
Tom says Mary doesn't think John would do that.
Tom said he thought Mary's suggestion was good.
Tom lied to Mary when he said he would do that.
Tom is the only person Mary says she can trust.
Tom has asked Mary to drive him to the airport.
Tom has already told Mary what he wants to buy.
Tom doesn't know why Mary went to the hospital.
Tom doesn't know why Mary and John are arguing.
Tom didn't tell Mary he wanted to quit his job.
Tom didn't know whether Mary could swim or not.
Tom didn't know when Mary was going to do that.
Tom and I are waiting for Mary, John and Alice.
Did you know Tom and John were Mary's brothers?
Did you know Mary and Alice were Tom's sisters?
Whenever I see Tom, I'm reminded of his father.
I'm not the one who advised Tom not to do that.
I'm not scared of Tom, but Tom is scared of me.
I'd like to know the reason why Tom isn't here.
I told Tom to put the eggs in the refrigerator.
I think I'll go to church with Tom next Sunday.
